notesStmt.note: From a Judeo-Arabic Translation of Genesis, neither that of Saʻadia Gaon nor that of Japheth ben ʻAli; Hebrew lead-words provided at beginning of each verse. Fragment ends at what may be end of parchment, in the middle of XXV 17 (חיוה (=חיי; the only text break, the open parashah after XXIV 67, is represented here by 3 open spaces.
Black ink ruling method: writing accommodates uneven cut of parchment columns
